column1: @entity1 had a very exciting summer vacation. She went to summer camp for the first time. @entity0 friends with a girl named @entity2. They shared a bunk bed in their cabin. @entity1'sfavorite activity was walking in the woods because she enjoyed nature. @entity2 liked arts andcrafts. Together, they made some art using leaves they found in the woods. Even after shefell in the water, @entity1 still enjoyed canoeing. She was sad when the camp was over, butpromised to keep in touch with her new friend.@entity1 went to the beach with her family in the summer as well. She loves the beach. @entity1collected shells and mailed some to her friend, @entity2, so she could make some arts andcrafts with them. @entity1 liked fishing with her brothers, cooking on the grill with her dad,and swimming in the ocean with her mother.The summer was fun, but @entity1 was very excited to go back to school. She missed herfriends and teachers. She was excited to tell them about her summer vacation.
she went to summer camp and the beach.
